Siamo a Gazipur, Bangladesh, e migliaia di passeggeri occupano ogni centimetro del treno regionale Drutojan Express in partenza per Dacca.

AND LAMENT YOUR OWN TRAINS! - A MOVIE BECOME A VIRAL SHOWS THOUSANDS OF PASSENGERS ENCOURAGING THE GAZIPUR STATION, IN BANGLADESH, TO GET A DIRECT TRAIN TO DACCA - THE WAGONS HAVE BEEN TAKEN OVER AT THIS POINT THAT IN LOTS THEY DECIDE TO TRAVEL ON THE ROOF OWN LIFE ... - VIDEO






From
 "Www.corriere.it"





passengers on the train in bangladesh 5

We certainly cannot complain about our means of transport - often too full. Watching this video (shot in time lapse) we can see that, in the end, someone is worse off. We are in Gazipur, Bangladesh, and thousands of passengers occupy every centimeter of the Drutojan Express regional train leaving for Dhaka.
